title: Pisco Punch Recipe
full_text:
Pisco Punch Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
pisco
3/4
ounce
fresh lemon juice
3/4
ounce
pineapple gomme
(see note)
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds, and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker, strainer,
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
